other_tests.procedure_name: Upper gastrointestinal endoscopy with duodenal biopsy
other_tests.findings: Marked villous blunting and expansion of the lamina propria by a dense cellular infiltrate composed predominantly of lymphocytes and plasma cells.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Resolution of histologic changes occurs gradually, over a period of months after the withdrawal of gluten.

other_tests.findings: IgG antibodies against gliadin were elevated at 26.6 U per liter; IgA antibodies against gliadin were elevated, more than 100 U.
